original_text: And Shaphan carried the book to the king, and brought the king word back again, saying, All that was committed to thy servants, they do it.
korean_text: 사반이 책을 가지고 왕에게 나아가서 복명하여 이르되 왕께서 종들에게 명령하신 것을 종들이 다 준행하였나이다

sentences.original_text: And Shaphan carried the book to the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사반은 그 책을 왕에게 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and brought the king word back again
saying, All that was committed to thy servants
sentences.korean_translation: 말하길, 당신의 종들에게 맡겨진 모든 것을
